text: The Private Life of Pyotr Vinogradov () is a 1934 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksandr Macheret.Сталевары и доярки поработали с огонькомЧАСТНАЯ ЖИЗНЬ ПЕТРА ВИНОГРАДОВА It stars Boris Livanov, V. Tsishevsky, and Konstantin Gradopolov. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1934 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Macheret Category:Soviet comedy movies
title: The Private Life of Pyotr Vinogradov
